revision.text:
{{doomwiki}} '''DeuTex''' is a WAD composing utility initially released in 1994. It uses a command line interface rather than a graphical interface, in order to ease WAD composing using scripts. As of 2017, development has been revived and it slowly gains more modern features, such as [[PNG]] support, while at the same time, getting rid of old bugs and limitations. As of July 2017, DeuTex 5.0.0 is the latest version available.
An graphical user interface version, named [[WinTex]], is available but it is outdated and not likely to to be updated.
== External Links ==
*[https://github.com/Doom-Utils/deutex GitHub repository] *[https://github.com/Doom-Utils/deutex/releases Downloads] *[http://www.teaser.fr/~amajorel/deutex/ Website (outdated)]
[[category:Editing tools]][[Category:Tools]]
